report.title: Get Count Unit Annotations
report.description: Return a list of annotations associated with the parent count unit.
report.query: SELECT DISTINCT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false WHERE l.location_type_id != #count_unit_boundary_location_type_id# AND l.deleted = false AND #website_filter# AND l.parent_id=#count_unit_id# ORDER BY l.id desc
